DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate Pharmacokinetics Safety / Tolerability Fimasartan Atorvastatin Healthy Male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial Evaluate Pharmacokinetics Safety/Tolerability Fimasartan Atorvastatin Healthy Male Volunteers .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , open-label , single dose , 3x3 partial replicate crossover study evaluate pharmacokinetics safety/tolerability . Within period , randomized subject 2 dose regimen fix dose combination Fimasartan/Atorvastatin co-administration Fimasartan Atorvastatin .
DOC.criteria: A Healthy male age 1950 year Body weight 55kg BMI 18 ~ 27 ( kg/m2 ) . A subject provide write informed consent voluntarily confirm willingness participate study , inform full detail study comply protocol . A subject eligible accord investigator 's assessment History presence clinically significant medical psychiatric condition disease . History gastrointestinal disease resection Hypersensitivity ingredient investigational product ( IP ) medication , food . Genetic Problem Galactose intolerance , Lapp lactase deficiency Glucosegalactose malabsorption . A subject take drug inhibit induce significantly DrugMetabolizing Enzyme within 1months . Positive result serum examination ( HIV , B C viral test , Syphilis ) . Seated BP le 100/65 mmHg great 140/90 mmHg screening . Participation study within 3months . History whole blood donation within 2months Apheresis 2 week .
